changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.sourcing_authorization AS SELECT sa.id, owner.name as owner, product.name as product, location.name as location, sa.notes, up.name AS updated_by, sa.update_date FROM sourcing_authorization sa JOIN agency owner ON sa.owner = owner.id JOIN product product ON sa.product = product.id JOIN location location ON sa.location = location.id JOIN agency up ON sa.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.sourcing_authorization OWNER TO core;
